name: bbin

scripts.commit: git commit --quiet -m "npmjs: $(npm --no-git-tag-version version patch)" README.md package.json
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run commit && git push --quiet && npm-auth
scripts.global: npm -g install --quiet $(npm show bbin packages) bbin
scripts.uninstall: npm -g uninstall --quiet $(npm show bbin packages) bbin

packages: cloudflare-cli dotenv semver shaurl spoof tap vercel wrangler
